Screenshot to PPT – Effortlessly Create Stunning Presentations from Webpages

Transform your web browsing experience into professional PowerPoint presentations with Screenshot to PPT. This intuitive Chrome extension empowers you to capture multiple screenshots of any webpage and seamlessly compile them into a high-quality PowerPoint (PPT) presentation with just a few clicks.


🔑 Key Features:

📸 Multiple Screenshot Capture: Easily capture and accumulate unlimited screenshots from your current webpage without any hassle.

🖼️ Thumbnail Previews: View all your captured screenshots as thumbnails within the extension popup, allowing for quick review and management.

🌟 High-Resolution Images: Ensure your presentations are crisp and clear with high-quality PNG screenshots that preserve every detail.

📄 One-Click PPT Generation: Compile all your screenshots into a neatly organized PowerPoint presentation, with each screenshot on its own slide, ready for download.

🧹 Manage Your Screenshots: Keep track of the number of screenshots you've captured and effortlessly clear them when needed to free up space.

🎨 User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy an intuitive and clean design that makes capturing and compiling screenshots straightforward for users of all levels.


🚀 How It Works:

Capture Screenshots:
Click the "Add Screenshot" button to capture the current view of your active webpage. Repeat as needed to gather multiple screenshots.

Review Thumbnails:
Browse through your captured screenshots displayed as thumbnails in the extension popup. Click on any thumbnail to view a full-size version in a new window.

Generate PPT:
Once you've captured all desired screenshots, click the "Generate PPT" button. The extension will automatically create a PowerPoint presentation with each screenshot placed on individual slides.

Download & Share:
Download the generated WebpageScreenshots.pptx file and share it with colleagues, students, or clients effortlessly.

Clear Screenshots:
Manage your storage by clearing all stored screenshots with a single click using the "Clear Screenshots" button.


🎯 Why Choose Screenshot to PPT?

Whether you're a student compiling research, a professional preparing a report, or anyone needing to create presentations from web content, Screenshot to PPT streamlines the process, saving you time and ensuring your presentations are visually appealing and organized.

🔧 Installation & Usage:

Install the Extension:
Add Screenshot to PPT to your Chrome browser from the Chrome Web Store.

Start Capturing:
Navigate to any webpage you wish to capture. Click on the Screenshot to PPT icon in your Chrome toolbar to open the popup interface.

Follow the Steps Above:
Use the "Add Screenshot", "Generate PPT", and "Clear Screenshots" buttons as needed to create your presentation.

🔒 Privacy & Permissions:

Screenshot to PPT requires access to your active tabs to capture screenshots and uses Chrome's local storage to manage your captured images. All data is processed locally in your browser and is never shared with third parties. Your privacy and data security are our top priorities.
